duck: Quantization (signal processing) - Quantization, in mathematics and digital signal processing, is the process of mapping a large set of input values to a smaller set â€“ such as rounding values to some unit of precision.
Quantization (physics) - In physics, quantization is the process of explaining a classical understanding of physical phenomena in terms of a newer understanding known as "quantum mechanics".
quantization definition: to subdivide (as energy) into small but measurable increments.

wiki.text:
__NOTOC__ 'Quantization' is the procedure of constraining something from a
relatively large or continuous set of values (such as the real numbers) to a
relatively small discrete set (such as the integers).
wiki.title: quantization
